OOC: Should've mentioned that Jayde's cloak was disrupted when the 
fire hit her - she can be seen and heard again.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> OOC: Talon knows to look for the slight ripple that appears when a 
> cloaked unit is on the move, then.  There's no other way he'd know 
> where to aim.
> 
> Jayde lets out a surprised squawk as the blast comes her way.  She 
> dodges, but not fast enough; the attack clips her, sending the tiny 
> transformer spinning wildly out of control.  She changes over to 
> robot mode, rolling to dissipate some of the force of the impact as 
> she crashes.
> 
> She eventually stops rolling some distance away and lays still.  
It's 
> unclear whether she's been knocked out or if she's faking it.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "deltazero1" <DeltaZero1@h...> wrote:
> > "well i'm sure i can help with that" spike said rolling past them 
> > from behind and transforming to robot mode he stared at Vlad 
"your 
> as 
> > strange as the other 2 lifeforms i saw" he said looking over him 
> from 
> > head to toe "yup you got to be a new kind of transform" 
> > 
> > Talon glided down a few feet from spike and landed "glad to see u 
> > again spike to bad u got careless again" he said before 
> transforming
